alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 10:48AM EDT until March 25 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. .Rainfall from late yesterday afternoon into this morning has resulted in river rises. Minor flooding is expected. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding of lowland areas around Stryker can be expected. At 12.0 feet, Portions of State Route 66 flood north of Archbold. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 11.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
